summary: Adds two new rings and two new necklaces one of each is light armor with dragonscale protection, the other is heavy armor with daedric protection.
descriptionHtml:
Adds two new rings and two new necklaces one of each is light armor with dragonscale protection, the other is heavy armor with daedric protection, they weigh very little as well. They are craftable with the ingredients for head, cuirass, boots, and gauntlets for their respective type (note the ingredients are the ingredients with my other mod Item Stat Overhaul: Armor and Weapons http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=79111625).
I made these so you call wear whatever armor, or lack thereof, that you wish while still having a good armor rating.

Also on Steam http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=90170577
author: XxMatrixNinjaxX
